title: 2021 Week 16 Recap - Happy Boxing Day!
itunes:title: 2021 Week 16 Recap - Happy Boxing Day!
description:
A room filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal recap all of the Week 16 games starting with the battle of the AFC East. Marc had a miserable Christmas due to some unfortunate matchups, and Gregg packed the umbrellas for a fun Atlanta game. Nick Shook stops by to discuss the Bengals and Eagles wins, and as always, the heroes recap the Sunday Night Football game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
